Title: Requires suicide prevention hotline centers to meet certain requirements for individuals who are in the perinatal period
Summary: Requires suicide prevention hotline centers to meet certain requirements for individuals who are in the perinatal period.
LawCode: Amd ยง36.03, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring suicide prevention hotline centers to meet certain requirements for individuals who are in the perinatal period
